System.WizPage0_Title: Welcome to the Tears of the Kingdom Mod Manager!
System.WizPage0_Description: This setup wizard will guide you through setting up TKMM to work with your computer. If you are having issues, consider joining our Discord server.
System.WizPage1_Title: Are you using a Ryujinx-based emulator?
System.WizPage1_Description:
Choosing "Yes" will start the setup process for Ryujinx. (Recommended for PC users)
Choosing "No" will prompt you to select your emulator executable file.
Choosing "Skip" will not setup any emulator, however you will have to manually setup your game rom configurations.
System.WizPage1A_Description: Make sure you have the prod and title keys configured and have "The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom" installed with at least one update.

Pages.GbModsDescription: GameBanana browser client for TotK mods
